Name: Legend of Streets
About the game: You can go to different levels by cleaning up all thugs, outlaws, street gangs and gangsters, Pirates, many criminals and cops in the story that takes place in different places. We are ready to enchant you with all its visual effects. Get ready for nostalgia, from combat mechanics to visual effects, we're preparing you for a fighting and arcade experience. Destroy enemies, complete the level and qualify for the next challenge!
